alert.note: Alert for Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Roane and east central Jackson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ripley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Statts Mills, Fairplain and Gay. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 127 and 135, and near mile marker 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
